message: Let's split a bit more than fairly to end this quickly. A bird in the hand is worth two in the bush, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, considering the money doesn't lose value for me.
This back and forth is only going to hurt both of us. Let's just split it evenly and call it a day.
Each round hurts you more than me, I'm willing to take that into account, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
Bob, I understand you're in a stronger position, but let's be reasonable. This offer still gives you a significant advantage, and dragging it out further only hurts me more. It's time to settle.
I understand you're losing value each round, but I'm not going to give in. My offer is still generous, considering the circumstances.
